##################### This is an autogenerated file. DONT MODIFY IT HERE. ####################

project(templateprojectwev_cp_unit_tests)

#sometimes google test is a piece of shit so it needs this set
set(gtest_force_shared_crt TRUE)

#set(CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/build)

# 'lib' is the folder with Google Test sources. build is the location it will be built
add_subdirectory("${QR_CORE_DIR}/Google_tests/lib" build)
include_directories(${gtest_SOURCE_DIR}/include ${gtest_SOURCE_DIR})

#grab all the unit tests files
file(GLOB UNIT_HEADERS
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/*.hpp"  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/*.h"
)
file(GLOB UNIT_SOURCES
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.cpp"  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.c"
)

# 'my_unit_tests' is the target name
# 'test1.cpp tests2.cpp' are source files with tests
add_executable(my_unit_tests  ${UNIT_HEADERS} ${UNIT_SOURCES})
target_include_directories(my_unit_tests PUBLIC include) 


target_link_libraries(my_unit_tests gtest gtest_main)
target_link_libraries(my_unit_tests templateprojectwev_CPPlib)
